EmailTemplate.name: lda_june2012-past participants
EmailTemplate.subject: What are your plans for this summer / fall?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Are you graduating this year?
Consider joining Live Different Academy, and spend 9 months traveling and learning with us!
"The Live Different Academy has given me hope for the future and faith in the power of my generation to change the world." - Paisley, LDA Student 2012
Still want to go on a Live Different Build this summer?
You've got two weeks left to register for Live Different Build Mexico in August!
"Everything about this trip is truly life changing. I love Mexico and I think Live Different Build is something everyone should see and be a part of at least once!" - Tya, HH Volunteer
Live Different Suite 400, 44 Hughson St. North Hamilton, ON L8R 1G3 Canada
(866) 432 4464 info@livedifferent.com www.livedifferent.com
